description.narrative: The purpose of the grant is to provide support to the project entitled Improving Support, Protection and Redress for Survivors of Rape and Other Forms of Sexual Violence in Hungary. The project will be carried out by MONA Foundation in partnership with other NGOs called the Keret Coalition. The project will aim to address the widespread public prejudice against victims of rape and other sexual violence in the country and the consequently the low rate of reporting abuses. The OSI support will cover the planned legal advocacy program with partner NGOs, which will involve professional legal aid to rape survivors and sexual abuse victims, raising of public awareness and sensitizing public authorities and professionals through specialized workshops. The activities will include challenging the current Penal Code, which does not comply with international standards and compilation of a protocol that offers institutional solution to promote adequate protection of victims' rights as well as their treatment
